title: THE CONTRACT: IMPULSE BUYERS
description: Eve Rogers was a beautiful blonde realtor who sold property in the Smokey Mountains of Tennessee, and she loved her life that she was blessed with just the way it was. But when a client brought his mysterious friend with him to look at some properties to surprise his new bride-to-be, William Lockhart soon had her under his spell, and they were immediately negotiating a contract that their lives depended on.They started a mysterious journey to the top of the mountain together with hand in hand as Eve tried to hold on to her sanity. The man that she had fallen for was where all of her trust rested, in spite of their crazy situation that they had fallen into. She was ready, willing and able to sign her life away, and she wondered if she was able to hold on tight enough to dampen his rings of fire that he caused in her, and give her time to discover his secrets.
author: Alvin Slater
